item.title: 亚洲搭乘华尔街涨势，美元因美国通胀缓解而下挫
item.description: 在一份较为温和的美国通胀报告提高了美联储今年将至少降息两次的预期之后，受华尔街隔夜飙升至历史最高点的提振，亚洲股市周四反弹。【原文：Asian stock markets rallied on Thursday, buoyed by Wall Street's surge to all-time peaks overnight after a milder U.S. inflation report raised expectations the Federal Reserve will deliver at least two rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 由于出口和需求疲软，泰国第一季度经济增长可能乏力：路透社民意调查
item.description: 路透社对经济学家进行的一项调查显示，尽管游客数量稳健增长，但受出口和内需疲软的影响，泰国经济在截至 3 月份的这一季度可能增长乏力。【原文：Growth in Thailand's economy was likely subdued in the quarter through March despite solid tourist arrivals, hampered by weak exports and domestic demand, a Reuters poll of economists found.】

item.title: 美国通胀放缓提振降息预期，美元下挫
item.description: 在美国核心通胀率创下三年来最慢、零售销售转为持平之后，美元周四跌至数月低点，这使得全球最大经济体降息的预期提前。【原文：The dollar skidded to multi-month lows on Thursday after U.S. core inflation hit its slowest in three years and retail sales turned flat, which pulled forward expectations for rate cuts in the world's biggest economy.】

item.title: 美国通胀数据温和，需求强劲，油价上涨
item.description: 周四，油价延续了上一交易日的涨势，原因是有迹象表明美国的需求更加强劲，数据显示美国的通胀率低于市场预期，这加强了降息的论据，而降息可能会导致需求更加强劲。【原文：Oil prices extended gains from the previous session on Thursday on signs of stronger demand in the U.S. where data showed slower inflation than markets expected, strengthening the argument for an interest rate cut which could result in even stronger demand.】

item.title: 智利给予 Albemarle 增加 24 万吨锂配额的选择权
item.description: 智利经济发展机构 CORFO 周三表示，它与 Albemarle 公司达成了一项协议，为这家美国公司增加 24 万公吨锂金属当量（LME）的生产配额提供了选择权。【原文：Chile's economic development agency CORFO on Wednesday said it reached an agreement with Albemarle to establish an option for the U.S. company to increase its production quota by 240,000 metric tons of lithium metal equivalent (LME).】

item.title: 日本经济下滑，使日本央行的加息计划复杂化
item.description: 日本经济在第一季度出现萎缩，受到消费和外部需求疲软的挤压，这给政策制定者带来了新的挑战，因为央行希望将利率从接近零的水平上调高。【原文：Japan's economy contracted in the first quarter, squeezed by weaker consumption and external demand and throwing a fresh challenge to policymakers as the central bank looks to lift interest rates away from near-zero levels.】

item.title: 日本第一季度国内生产总值年率萎缩 2.0%，原因是消费和出口疲软
item.description: 日本政府周四公布的数据显示，受私人消费和出口疲软的影响，1-3 月份日本经济按年率计算环比萎缩 2.0%。【原文：Japan's economy contracted at an annualised clip of 2.0% in January-March from the previous quarter, weighed by sluggish private consumption and exports, government data showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 对冲基金 Coatue 第一季度减持苹果股票，Viking 建立仓位
item.description: 周三的证券文件显示，对冲基金 Coatue Management 在第一季度减持了苹果公司的股票，而 Viking Global Investors 则建立了相当规模的新仓位。【原文：Hedge fund Coatue Management dissolved its stake in Apple Inc in the first quarter while Viking Global Investors built a sizeable new position, securities filings showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: IBM 将在爱尔兰增加 800 个人工智能相关岗位
item.description: 爱尔兰国家投资局（IDA Ireland）周四表示，IBM 计划在爱尔兰增聘多达 800 名员工，以帮助打造以人工智能技术为支撑的先进软件，这是爱尔兰跨国公司部门今年宣布的最大一桩招聘计划。【原文：IBM plans to hire up to 800 more people in Ireland to help build advanced software underpinned by AI technology, the biggest job announcement in the country's multinational sector this year, state investment agency IDA Ireland said on Thursday.】

item.title: 特斯拉必须面对车主就自动驾驶索赔提起的诉讼
item.description: 一名美国法官周三驳回了特斯拉要求驳回指控埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的电动汽车公司误导车主相信他们的汽车不久将具备自动驾驶功能的诉讼。【原文：A U.S. judge on Wednesday rejected Tesla's bid to dismiss a lawsuit accusing Elon Musk's electric car company of misleading owners into believing that their vehicles could soon have self-driving capabilities.】

item.title: 比特币 ETF 在第一季度吸引了 Millenium Global 和威斯康星退休系统的押注
item.description: 根据最近的监管文件显示，包括千禧年管理有限责任公司（Millennium Management LLC）在内的一些对冲基金和其他资产管理机构在第一季度收购了最近推出的与比特币价格挂钩的美国交易所交易基金（ETF）的股份。【原文：A handful of hedge funds, including Millennium Management LLC, and other asset managers are among the institutions that acquired stakes in the recently launched U.S. exchange-traded funds (ETFs) tied to the price of bitcoin in the first quarter, according to recent regulatory filings.】

item.title: 哈德逊湾、摩根士丹利第一季度入股特朗普社交媒体公司
item.description: 周三的证券文件显示，哈德逊湾资本管理公司（Hudson Bay Capital Management）、Geode 资本管理公司（Geode Capital Management）和摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）等大型机构投资者在第一季度持有唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的特朗普传媒科技集团（Trump Media & Technology Group）的股票。【原文：Hudson Bay Capital Management, Geode Capital Management and Morgan Stanley were among the large institutional investors that took positions in Donald Trump's Trump Media & Technology Group in the first quarter, securities filings showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 文件显示，拜登的个人财务状况在 2023 年变化不大
item.description: 联邦文件显示，美国总统乔-拜登在 2023 年披露的个人财务状况变化不大，尽管他的图书版税收入有所下降，他所欠的房屋净值贷款额也有所上升。【原文：U.S. President Joe Biden disclosed a little-changed personal financial situation in 2023, though his book royalties fell and the amount he owed on a home equity loan rose, federal documents showed.】

item.title: 索罗斯基金管理公司解散纽约银行股份，买入高盛股票
item.description: 索罗斯基金管理公司（Soros Fund Management）周三提交的一份监管文件显示，该公司在 2024 年第一季度解散了其在陷入困境的贷款机构纽约社区银行（New York Community Bancorp）的股份。【原文：Soros Fund Management has dissolved its share stake in embattled lender New York Community Bancorp in the first quarter of 2024, a regulatory filing showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 早间竞价：随着 CPI 风险消散......开始起飞！
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 特朗普传媒称因审计师变更将推迟季度申报
item.description: Trump Media & Technology Group 周三向美国证券交易委员会提交了一份通知，表示将推迟季度申报，而就在几天前，监管机构指控其前审计师欺诈。【原文：Trump Media & Technology Group filed a notice to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission on Wednesday that it would delay its quarterly filing, just days after the regulator charged its former auditor with fraud.】

item.title: 堪萨斯城联储确定杰克逊霍尔会议日期为 8 月 22-24 日
item.description: 堪萨斯城联邦储备银行周三表示，其将于 8 月 22-24 日在怀俄明州杰克逊霍尔举行年度中央银行会议。【原文：The Federal Reserve Bank of Kansas City on Wednesday said its annual central banking conference in Jackson Hole, Wyoming, will take place from Aug. 22-24.】

item.title: 体育联盟质疑广播公司 Diamond 能否在没有康卡斯特的情况下生存下去
item.description: 美国职业棒球大联盟、国家冰球联盟和国家篮球协会周三表示，如果不与有线电视分销商康卡斯特公司（Comcast）达成新协议，破产的广播公司钻石体育可能无法生存。【原文：Major League Baseball, the National Hockey League and the National Basketball Association said on Wednesday that bankrupt broadcaster Diamond Sports may not survive without a new deal with cable distributor Comcast .】

item.title: 卢拉责成巴西国家石油公司新任首席执行官玛格达-尚布里亚特大力创造就业机会
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）的下一任首席执行官玛格达-尚布里亚特（Magda Chambriard）的履历和任务是让这家巴西国营石油公司重现工人党政府执政时期的辉煌：成为创造就业机会和推动工业发展的引擎。【原文：The next chief executive of Petrobras , Magda Chambriard, arrives with the résumé and mandate to make Brazil's state-run oil firm what it was under prior Workers Party governments: an engine of job creation and industrial development, said people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 挪威主权财富基金因道德问题将三家公司排除在外
item.description: 挪威中央银行周三表示，出于道德方面的考虑，其执行董事会已决定将三家公司排除在政府养老基金之外。【原文：Norway's central bank said on Wednesday that its executive board has decided to exclude three companies from its government pension fund over ethical concerns.】

item.title: 加拿大自称 "加密货币之王 "的人及其同伙被控欺诈罪
item.description: 加拿大警方周三表示，一名自称加拿大 "加密货币大王 "的人和一名从投资者那里获得 4000 多万加元（2940 万美元）资金的同伙已被逮捕，并被指控犯有欺诈罪。【原文：A self-proclaimed Canadian "Crypto King" and an associate who received more than C$40 million ($29.4 million) from investors have been arrested and charged with fraud, police said on Wednesday.】

item.title: AT&T 与 AST SpaceMobile 合作提供天基宽带网络
item.description: 电信巨头 AT&T 公司周三表示，已与 AST SpaceMobile 公司达成协议，为手机提供天基宽带网络。【原文：Telecom giant AT&T has entered an agreement with AST SpaceMobile to provide a space-based broadband network direct to cell phones, the companies said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 伯克希尔披露以 67.2 亿美元入股保险公司 Chubb
item.description: 沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）的伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）周三透露，将以 67.2 亿美元的价格新入股保险公司 Chubb，从而结束了数月来外界对该公司进行大笔新投资的猜测。【原文：Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway on Wednesday revealed a new, $6.72 billion stake in the insurer Chubb , ending months of speculation that it had made a big new investment.】

item.title: 思科预测第四季度营收高于预期
item.description: 思科系统公司（Cisco Systems）周三预测第四季度营收将高于华尔街预期，原因是这家网络设备制造商受益于企业支出的回升和供应链限制的缓解。【原文：Cisco Systems forecast fourth-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday as the network equipment maker benefits from a pick up in enterprise spending and easing supply chain constraints.】

item.title: 标普发现全球企业违约从 3 月到 4 月翻了一番
item.description: 根据S&P全球评级公司的一份报告，4月份全球企业债务违约比3月份增加了一倍多，创下了2020年10月以来的最高月度记录。【原文：Global corporate debt defaults more than doubled in April from March to their highest monthly tally since October 2020, according to a report from S&P Global Ratings.】

item.title: 布里奇沃特第一季度大举投资 Mag Seven 股票，但拒绝了特斯拉 - 文档
item.description: 证券文件显示，桥水联合公司（Bridgewater Associates）第一季度在所谓的 "七大巨头 "美股中的六只股票上投入了 8 亿美元，押注谷歌母公司 Alphabet，同时避开了陷入困境的电动汽车制造商特斯拉（Tesla）股票。【原文：Bridgewater Associates piled into six of the so-called Magnificent Seven megacap U.S. stocks in the first quarter, making an $800 million bet on Google-parent Alphabet while avoiding struggling shares of electric car-maker Tesla , securities filings showed.】

item.title: 迪士尼将大幅削减传统电视网络支出
item.description: 华特迪士尼首席执行官鲍勃-艾格（Bob Iger）周三表示，随着消费者转向流媒体，公司将大幅削减对传统电视网络节目的投资。【原文：Walt Disney will cut its investment in programming for traditional television networks pretty dramatically as the company navigates the consumer shift to streaming, Chief Executive Bob Iger said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 埃克森称代理顾问格拉斯-刘易斯应回避提出建议
item.description: 美国石油巨头埃克森公司（Exxon）周三表示，由于 "利益冲突"，代理顾问格拉斯-刘易斯公司（Glass Lewis）应回避就其即将召开的股东大会提出建议。【原文：U.S. oil giant Exxon said on Wednesday proxy advisor Glass Lewis should recuse itself from making recommendations on its upcoming shareholder meeting due to "conflicts of interest."】

item.title: 美国将于今年秋季发布针对中国联网汽车的法规
item.description: 美国商务部长吉娜-雷蒙多（Gina Raimondo）周三表示，商务部计划在今年秋天发布针对中国联网汽车的拟议规则，理由是美国人的数据面临国家安全风险。【原文：U.S. Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo said on Wednesday that her department plans to issue proposed rules on Chinese connected vehicles this fall, citing national security risks to Americans' data.】

item.title: Netflix 的广告支持计划用户达到 4000 万
item.description: Netflix 周三表示，其广告支持层级的全球月活跃用户已从一年前的 500 万增至 4000 万，这表明其通过更便宜的计划吸引新用户的努力正在取得成效。【原文：Netflix said on Wednesday its ad-supported tier has reached 40 million global monthly active users, from 5 million a year earlier, a sign that its push to attract new users with the cheaper plan is paying off.】
